overview: when the leafs subside. This debut from director joey lewis is a 5 minute long peaceful short movie about a guy who is overused in the stress of working from home in lockdown so he goes for a calming bikeride in autumn and sees beautiful and warming sights and joey tries to experiment with the shots in the film in a unique but simple way
tagline: when the leafs subside he goes on a bicycle ride
title: When the leafs subside
